member.summary: Incompatible. The shipment is not within the agreed specifications (e.g. to heavy / big / ...)

member.summary: Ultimately lost. Consignment is utimately lost and will no longer be searched for

member.summary: The delivery is obscure

member.summary: The consignment arrived too late for normal processing

member.summary: The consignment did not arrive or parts of the consignment are missing

member.summary: Partly missing in the entrance (additional information number and type of packaging

member.summary: The consignment was damaged on arrival

member.summary: Packaging differences (additional information number and packaging)

member.summary: Welded pallet, no guarantee for content, as not testable (only applies to non-scannable pallets)

member.summary: Quantity difference Bordero / Discharge (acquisition error)

member.summary: Unloading - not complete, damaged

member.summary: The consignment was loaded

member.name: P:Conizi.Model.Shared.Entities.EdiGatewayExceptions.Halted

member.summary: Not in delivery - goods damaged

member.summary: Loaded from Gateway to...
